page.title: 18Hobbies
page.content: We found the villagers were interested in very different things.They were as follows:photography, knitting,painting D.I.Y., decorating and pottery. Some unusual ones were dog breeding, and one man had done D.I.Y. for 51 years.Other hobbies were: singing, embroidery, sailing and sport in general.Most people had been occupied by their interests for more than 20 years.We found also that people from the age of 8 to 13 had sport as their main interest, and people from the age of 14 to 40 had sport, knitting and D.I.Y. as their interests.People from 41 to 70 had D.I.Y. and gardening as their main interests.In the evening T.V. is commonly watched as a pastime.
